name: The Lost traveller
description:
Hello there,

Here is my new game for the 'I can't write but I want to tell a story' game jam. I hope you enjoy this little game made in 7 days. 

( I hope you found the newsletter, if not play it again)

music by 'dreiseitiges quadrat': https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9C0WLtiEObrUj_JVvsmBKw

Thank you for playing!
